00038 void TextFileWriterTest::testCreation()

00043 
00044 void TextFileWriterTest::testmethod_WriteFile()
00045 {
00046         TextFileWriter writer;
00047         map<string, string> params;
00048         std::string name = "test.file.text";
00049         params["a"] = "b";
00050         params["b"] = "c";
00051         params["c"] = "d";
00052         writer.WriteFile(name, params);
00053 
00054         const int linelen=32;
00055         char line[linelen];
00056         std::ifstream instr(name.c_str());
00057         instr.getline(line, linelen);
00058         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( strncmp(line, "a=b", 3) == 0 );
00059         instr.getline(line, linelen);
00060         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( strncmp(line, "b=c", 3) == 0 );
00061         instr.getline(line, linelen);
00062         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( strncmp(line, "c=d", 3) == 0 );
00063 }
